Bull City Venture Partners

Bull City Venture Partners is a venture capital firm investing $250K to $2M in bold founders building software and tech-enabled companies. They focus primarily on B2B software and tech-enabled businesses, emphasizing a team approach and high level of service to their portfolio companies.

Offices: Durham (United States)

Investment Stages: Pre-Seed, Seed, Series A, Series B

Markets: B2B software, tech-enabled businesses, cloud computing, eCommerce, fintech, logistics, healthtech

Founded Year: 2012

Investor Type: Venture Capital

Portfolio Companies: Levitate, Ferretly, GreenPlaces

Website: https://www.bcvp.com

Team Page: https://www.bcvp.com/team

Portfolio Link: https://www.bcvp.com/companies

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/bull-city-venture-partners

Twitter: https://twitter.com/bcvp

Instagram:

Crunchbase: https://www.crunchbase.com/organization/bull-city-venture-partners

Pitchbook: https://pitchbook.com/profiles/investor/56978-02
